templateData.kat:
The Wither Skeleton Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Common}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_common_level_1 = {{Coins|25,000}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |cost_common_level_100 = {{Coins|17,500}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |time_common = 1 Hour |cost_uncommon_level_1 = {{Coins|50,000}}
32 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |cost_uncommon_level_100 = {{Coins|35,000}}
32 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |time_uncommon = 3 Hours |cost_rare_level_1 = {{Coins|100,000}}
64 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |cost_rare_level_100 = {{Coins|70,000}}
64 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |time_rare = 6 Hours |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|250,000}}
128 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|175,000}}
128 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |time_epic = 12 Hours |rarity_low = {{Common}} |rarity_high = {{Legendary}} |cost_total_level_1 = {{Coins|425,000}}
240 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |cost_total_level_100 = {{Coins|297,500}}
240 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_coal.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Coal]] [[Enchanted Coal]] |time_total = 22 Hours }}
